dashboards.title: Dashboards
dashboards.description: List of GrafanaDashboard objects. Each dashboard is base64 encoded, lzma-compressed, json-dumped dashboard data.

metrics_scrape_jobs.title: Metrics Scrape Jobs

log_slots.title: Log Slots
log_slots.description: List of snap slots to connect to for scraping logs. Each slot is in the form "snap-name:slot".

config.title: Config
config.description: When dumped into a databag in JSON format, this configuration data will be nested under the key defaulted to "config".
